title: Can we draw a starfish for educational purposes 2D living things
transcript:
[Questioner] is it permissible to draw 
starfish or something like that if there   is an educational purpose because we 
know that these are living creatures so the ruling on drawing living creatures is that 
once you see it you can see that there is life in   it a starfish does not have facial features like 
an elephant like a fish like to my knowledge I   know I don't see their eyes their face Etc 
therefore just the drawing in 2D not 3D 2D   of these creatures is permissible especially if it 
is for educational purposes and Allah Knows Best
